metadata.title: CVE-2015-8614 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Multiple stack-based buffer overflows in the (1) conv_jistoeuc, (2)conv_euctojis, and (3) conv_sjistoeuc functions in codeconv.c in Claws Mailbefore 3.13.1 allow remote attackers to have unspecified impact via acrafted email, involving Japanese character set conversion.

criterions.comment: macopix: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
claws-mail: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
